DataElement.preferredName: Acute Graft Versus Host Disease Symptom Severe Abdominal pain Gross Blood in Stool Observed Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Indicator of whether or not there has been severe abdominal pain with or without ileus, or grossly bloody stool?

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Acute Graft Versus Host Disease Symptom Severe Abdominal pain Gross Blood in Stool Observed
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A syndrome of immunologically mediated tissue damage that may occur following an allogeneic transplant, usually affecting the skin, liver, and GI tract. The onset is usually within one hundred days of transplantation or immunologic manipulation._Subjective evidence of disease perceived by the patient._Intensely bad or unpleasant in degree, quality or extent._A disorder characterized by a sensation of marked discomfort in the abdominal region._Visible to the naked eye._A finding indicating the presence of blood in stool. It is the result of gastrointestinal hemorrhage and it may be easily seen in stool or may be identified microscopically._Ascertained or determined through monitoring or observation.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Acute Graft Versus Host Disease Symptom
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A syndrome of immunologically mediated tissue damage that may occur following an allogeneic transplant, usually affecting the skin, liver, and GI tract. The onset is usually within one hundred days of transplantation or immunologic manipulation.:Subjective evidence of disease perceived by the patient.

Concepts.definition: A syndrome of immunologically mediated tissue damage that may occur following an allogeneic transplant, usually affecting the skin, liver, and GI tract. The onset is usually within one hundred days of transplantation or immunologic manipulation.
Subjective evidence of disease perceived by the patient.

Property.preferredName: Severe Abdominal pain Gross Blood in Stool Observed
Property.preferredDefinition: Intensely bad or unpleasant in degree, quality or extent.:A disorder characterized by a sensation of marked discomfort in the abdominal region.:Visible to the naked eye.:A finding indicating the presence of blood in stool. It is the result of gastrointestinal hemorrhage and it may be easily seen in stool or may be identified microscopically.:Ascertained or determined through monitoring or observation.

Concepts.definition: Intensely bad or unpleasant in degree, quality or extent.
A disorder characterized by a sensation of marked discomfort in the abdominal region.
A finding indicating the presence of blood in stool. It is the result of gastrointestinal hemorrhage and it may be easily seen in stool or may be identified microscopically.
Ascertained or determined through monitoring or observation.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.
